document_data.name: Divine Bloodline
document_data.mainbody: '''''Divine bloodline''''' was a [[Divine magic|divine]] [[divination]] [[spell]] used by specialty priests devoted to [[Siamorphe]] called [[Highborn]]s, enabling them to determine noble lineage.
document_data.Effects: This spell allowed the caster to determine noble blood within the target and how closely related they were to a known noble, including bloodlines long forgotten in history. The caster's skill determined how far back along the lineage they could trace and the number of bloodlines present for any given target.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required as [[material component]]s the priest's [[holy symbol]] to cast.
